metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: Section applies to columns supporting beams carrying loads from not more than 2 wood-frame floors where supported joist length does not exceed 5 m and live load does not exceed 2.4 kPa
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to columns used to support a) beams carrying loads from not more than 2 wood-frame floors where i) the supported length of joists bearing on such beams does not exceed 5 m, and ii) the live load on any floor does not exceed 2.4 kPa

requirements.description: Section applies to columns supporting beams or header joists carrying loads from not more than 2 levels of balconies, decks or platforms (or 1 level plus roof)
requirements.exact_quote: beams or header joists carrying loads from not more than 2 levels of wood-frame balconies, decks or other accessible exterior platforms, or 1 level plus the roof
conditions: max 2 levels of platforms or 1 level plus roof

requirements.description: Maximum supported length of joists bearing on beams for deck/platform columns
requirements.exact_quote: the supported length of joists bearing on such beams or joists does not exceed 5 m

requirements.description: Maximum sum of specified snow and occupancy loads for deck/platform columns
requirements.exact_quote: the sum of the specified snow and occupancy loads does not exceed 4.8 kPa

requirements.description: Section applies to columns supporting carport roofs
requirements.exact_quote: carport roofs (see Section 9.35.)

requirements.description: Columns for applications other than those in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4
requirements.exact_quote: Columns for applications other than as described in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4

requirements.description: Columns shall be centrally located on a footing conforming to Section 9.15
requirements.exact_quote: Columns shall be centrally located on a footing conforming to Section 9.15

requirements.description: Columns shall be securely fastened to the supported member to reduce lateral differential movement
requirements.exact_quote: Columns shall be securely fastened to the supported member to reduce the likelihood of lateral differential movement between the column and the supported member

requirements.description: Columns shall be laterally supported to resist racking, directly or by connection to supported members
requirements.exact_quote: columns shall be laterally supported to resist racking a) directly, or b) by connection to the supported members

requirements.description: Lateral support not required where distance from ground to joists is not more than 600 mm and columns support a deck with no superstructure
requirements.exact_quote: Columns need not be provided with lateral support as described in Sentence (2), where a) the distance from finished ground to the underside of the joists is not more than 600 mm, and b) the columns support a deck with no superstructure

requirements.description: Maximum height from ground to underside of joists for lateral support exemption
requirements.exact_quote: the distance from finished ground to the underside of the joists is not more than 600 mm

requirements.description: Minimum outside diameter for steel pipe columns
requirements.exact_quote: steel pipe columns shall have an outside diameter of not less than 73 mm

requirements.description: Minimum wall thickness for steel pipe columns
requirements.exact_quote: a wall thickness of not less than 4.76 mm

requirements.description: Other column sizes permitted where load bearing capacities are shown to be adequate
requirements.exact_quote: Columns of sizes other than as specified in Sentence (1) are permitted to be used where the load bearing capacities are shown to be adequate

requirements.description: Steel columns shall be fitted with at least 1 bearing plate at each end
requirements.exact_quote: steel columns shall be fitted with not less than 1 bearing plate at each end

requirements.description: Where column supports wooden beam, top plate shall extend across full width of beam
requirements.exact_quote: where a column supports a wooden beam, the top plate shall extend across the full width of the beam

requirements.description: Top plate not required where column supports steel beam and attachment provision is made
requirements.exact_quote: The top plate required in Sentence (1) need not be provided where a column supports a steel beam and provision is made for the attachment of the column to the beam

requirements.description: Exterior steel columns shall be treated with at least one coat of rust-inhibitive paint
requirements.exact_quote: Exterior steel columns shall be treated on the outside surface with at least one coat of rust-inhibitive paint

requirements.description: Maximum imposed load for adjustable steel columns conforming to CAN/CGSB-7.2
requirements.exact_quote: Where the imposed load does not exceed 36 kN, adjustable steel columns shall conform to CAN/CGSB-7.2, "Adjustable Steel Columns."

requirements.description: Steel columns exceeding 36 kN load shall be designed in accordance with Part 4
requirements.exact_quote: Steel columns other than those described in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4

requirements.description: Width or diameter of wood column shall not be less than width of supported member
requirements.exact_quote: The width or diameter of a wood column shall be not less than the width of the supported member

requirements.description: Minimum diameter for round wood columns unless calculations show lesser size is adequate
requirements.exact_quote: columns shall be not less than 184 mm for round columns

requirements.description: Minimum size for rectangular wood columns (140 mm by 140 mm) unless calculations show lesser size is adequate
requirements.exact_quote: 140 mm by 140 mm for rectangular columns, unless calculations are provided to show that lesser sizes are adequate

requirements.description: Wood columns shall be solid, glued-laminated or built-up
requirements.exact_quote: Wood columns shall be either solid, glued-laminated or built-up

requirements.description: Minimum thickness for full-length members of built-up columns
requirements.exact_quote: Built-up columns shall consist of not less than 38 mm thick full-length members

requirements.description: Minimum diameter for bolts in built-up columns
requirements.exact_quote: bolted together with not less than 9.52 mm diam bolts

requirements.description: Maximum spacing for bolts in built-up columns
requirements.exact_quote: bolts spaced not more than 450 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum nail length for built-up columns
requirements.exact_quote: nailed together with not less than 76 mm nails

requirements.description: Maximum spacing for nails in built-up columns
requirements.exact_quote: nails spaced not more than 300 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Glued-laminated columns shall conform to Section 4.3
requirements.exact_quote: Glued-laminated columns shall conform to Section 4.3

requirements.description: Wood columns shall be separated from concrete in contact with ground by 0.05 mm polyethylene film or Type S roll roofing
requirements.exact_quote: Wood columns shall be separated from concrete in contact with the ground by 0.05 mm polyethylene film or Type S roll roofing

requirements.description: Minimum thickness of polyethylene film separator between wood column and concrete
requirements.exact_quote: 0.05 mm polyethylene film

requirements.description: Unit masonry columns shall be built of units conforming to CSA A165.1
requirements.exact_quote: Unit masonry columns shall be built of masonry units a) conforming to CSA A165.1, "Concrete block masonry units"

requirements.description: Minimum compressive strength over net area for masonry column blocks
requirements.exact_quote: having a compressive strength over the net area of the block of not less than 15 MPa

requirements.description: Minimum square size for unit masonry columns (290 mm by 290 mm)
requirements.exact_quote: Unit masonry columns shall be not less than 290 mm by 290 mm or 240 mm by 380 mm in size

requirements.description: Minimum rectangular size for unit masonry columns (240 mm by 380 mm)
requirements.exact_quote: 290 mm by 290 mm or 240 mm by 380 mm in size

requirements.description: Concrete for columns shall conform to Section 9.3
requirements.exact_quote: Concrete shall conform to Section 9.3

requirements.description: Minimum size for rectangular concrete columns (200 mm by 200 mm)
requirements.exact_quote: Concrete columns shall be not less than 200 mm by 200 mm for rectangular columns

requirements.description: Minimum diameter for circular concrete columns
requirements.exact_quote: 230 mm diam for circular columns
